resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103201</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103201</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension strategies for English language learners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassenstrategien für englische 
Sprachenanfänger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies de compréhension de lecture pour des 
étudiants d'anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias da compreensão da leitura para 
learners de língua inglesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie di comprensione della lettura per gli 
studenti di lingue inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές κατανόησης ανάγνωσης για τους αρχαρίους 
αγγλικής γλώσσας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrategias de la comprensión de la lectura para 
los principiantes de lenguaje inglés</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Strategies like think-pair-share, think-alouds, and Generating Interaction between Schemata and Text (GIST) can help English language learners, content-area learners, and all students make sense of text while they read.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strategien mögen Denken-Paaranteil, 
denken-alouds, und das Festlegen von von Interaktion zwischen Schemata
und Text (KERN) kann englische Sprachenanfängern, 
Inhalt-Bereich Anfängern und allen Kursteilnehmern helfen sind 
sinnvoll vom Text, während sie lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les stratégies aiment la penser-paire-part, 
pensent-alouds, et produire de l'interaction entre les schémas et le 
texte (ESSENTIEL) peut aider des étudiants d'anglais, des 
étudiants de contenu-zone, et tous les étudiants se comprennent du 
texte tandis qu'ils lisent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As estratégias gostam da pens-par-parte, 
pensam-alouds, e gerar a interação entre os schemata e o texto 
(GIST) pode ajudar a learners de língua inglesa, a learners da 
índice-área, e a todos os estudantes faz o sentido do texto quando 
lerem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le strategie gradiscono la pens-accoppi-parte, 
pensano -alouds e generare l'interazione fra gli schemi ed il testo 
(GIST) può aiutare gli studenti di lingue inglesi, i principianti di 
soddisfare-zona e tutti gli allievi ha il significato di testo mentre 
leggono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι στρατηγικές όπως το σκέφτομαι-ζευγάρι-μερίδιο, 
σκέφτονται -σκέφτομαι-αλοuδς, και η παραγωγή της αλληλεπίδρασης 
μεταξύ των σχημάτων και του κειμένου (ΟΥΣΙΑ) μπορεί να βοηθήσει 
τους αρχαρίους αγγλικής γλώσσας, αρχάριοι 
ικανοποιημένος-περιοχής, και όλοι οι σπουδαστές κατανοούν το 
κείμενο ενώ διαβάζουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las estrategias tienen gusto de la 
pensar-par-parte, piensan -alouds, y la generación de la interacción
entre los esquemas y el texto (GIST) puede ayudar a principiantes de 
lenguaje inglés, a principiantes del contenido-a'rea, y a todos los 
estudiantes tiene sentido del texto mientras que leen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ELLEN DOUGLAS

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103201</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
